Statements.Statement: select Distinct A.UserID, UserName from UMS_tblUserAccount A where [Stop] = 0

SELECT Code as UserID, Name as UserName FROM SAFVIET_tblDanhSachQuanLy WHERE IsQuanLyKhuVuc = 1
